title: Chat bug
body:
Ok so there was another update today, I don't know if it has fixed the champ select bug because i haven't played much but there is now a chat bug. When you are chating to someone, what you say does not follow the other person's speech, but goes after what you first say. It doesn't really effect the game but I just wanted to let you guys know of this. Also the times seem to be wrong. Example:
[9:58AM] IodineAwesome: Hey
game?
u start plz
ok :)
is your chat being weird?
like its not putting the words after mine?
[10:52AM] : ok seeya
[7:23PM] nyanswag3076: hi
sure
ok just hang on fixing my rune book
yea
yea
[8:16PM] : i gtg for dinner

replies.body:
Im having exactly the same problem. Really annoying trying to re-read a conversation. Only happened since the last patch.

My friend has the same issue. We both restarted client but is still the same.

Not a huge issue just really annoying

Hey man,

Sounds to me like your systems clock might be out of wack, could you try making sure your system clock is set to the correct timezone and then sync that with an Internet Time Server, there's a good guide [here](http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/) on how to achieve that.

Let me know if this helps, thanks.
Also I just noticed that I posted this like 2 minutes ago but it says I posted it 9 hours ago O.o Not sure if it's anyone else or just me.
